00038   // sass config options structure
00039   struct Sass_Options {
00040 
00041     // Precision for fractional numbers
00042     int precision;
00043 
00044     // Output style for the generated css code
00045     // A value from above SASS_STYLE_* constants
00046     enum Sass_Output_Style output_style;
00047 
00048     // Emit comments in the generated CSS indicating
00049     // the corresponding source line.
00050     bool source_comments;
00051 
00052     // embed sourceMappingUrl as data uri
00053     bool source_map_embed;
00054 
00055     // embed include contents in maps
00056     bool source_map_contents;
00057 
00058     // Disable sourceMappingUrl in css output
00059     bool omit_source_map_url;
00060 
00061     // Treat source_string as sass (as opposed to scss)
00062     bool is_indented_syntax_src;
00063 
00064     // The input path is used for source map
00065     // generation. It can be used to define
00066     // something with string compilation or to
00067     // overload the input file path. It is
00068     // set to "stdin" for data contexts and
00069     // to the input file on file contexts.
00070     char* input_path;
00071 
00072     // The output path is used for source map
00073     // generation. Libsass will not write to
00074     // this file, it is just used to create
00075     // information in source-maps etc.
00076     char* output_path;
00077 
00078     // String to be used for indentation
00079     const char* indent;
00080     // String to be used to for line feeds
00081     const char* linefeed;
00082 
00083     // Colon-separated list of paths
00084     // Semicolon-separated on Windows
00085     // Maybe use array interface instead?
00086     char* include_path;
00087     char* plugin_path;
00088 
00089     // Include paths (linked string list)
00090     struct string_list* include_paths;
00091     // Plugin paths (linked string list)
00092     struct string_list* plugin_paths;
00093 
00094     // Path to source map file
00095     // Enables source map generation
00096     // Used to create sourceMappingUrl
00097     char* source_map_file;
00098 
00099     // Directly inserted in source maps
00100     char* source_map_root;
00101 
00102     // Custom functions that can be called from sccs code
00103     Sass_Function_List c_functions;
00104 
00105     // List of custom importers
00106     Sass_Importer_List c_importers;
00107 
00108     // List of custom headers
00109     Sass_Importer_List c_headers;
00110 
00111   };
00112

00172   #define IMPLEMENT_SASS_OPTION_ACCESSOR(type, option) \
00173     type ADDCALL sass_option_get_##option (struct Sass_Options* options) { return options->option; } \
00174     void ADDCALL sass_option_set_##option (struct Sass_Options* options, type option) { options->option = option; }
00175   #define IMPLEMENT_SASS_OPTION_STRING_ACCESSOR(type, option) \
00176     type ADDCALL sass_option_get_##option (struct Sass_Options* options) { return options->option; } \
00177     void ADDCALL sass_option_set_##option (struct Sass_Options* options, type option) \
00178     { free(options->option); options->option = option ? sass_strdup(option) : 0; }
00179 
00180   #define IMPLEMENT_SASS_CONTEXT_GETTER(type, option) \
00181     type ADDCALL sass_context_get_##option (struct Sass_Context* ctx) { return ctx->option; }
00182   #define IMPLEMENT_SASS_CONTEXT_TAKER(type, option) \
00183     type sass_context_take_##option (struct Sass_Context* ctx) \
00184     { type foo = ctx->option; ctx->option = 0; return foo; }

00186   // helper for safe access to c_ctx
00187   static const char* safe_str (const char* str) {
00188     return str == NULL ? "" : str;
00189   }

00191   static void copy_strings(const std::vector<std::string>& strings, char*** array) {
00192     int num = static_cast<int>(strings.size());
00193     char** arr = (char**) malloc(sizeof(char*) * (num + 1));
00194     if (arr == 0) throw(bad_alloc());
00195 
00196     for(int i = 0; i < num; i++) {
00197       arr[i] = (char*) malloc(sizeof(char) * (strings[i].size() + 1));
00198       if (arr[i] == 0) throw(bad_alloc());
00199       std::copy(strings[i].begin(), strings[i].end(), arr[i]);
00200       arr[i][strings[i].size()] = '\0';
00201     }
00202 
00203     arr[num] = 0;
00204     *array = arr;
00205   }
00206 
00207   static void free_string_array(char ** arr) {
00208     if(!arr)
00209         return;
00210 
00211     char **it = arr;
00212     while (it && (*it)) {
00213       free(*it);
00214       ++it;
00215     }
00216 
00217     free(arr);
00218   }

00220   static int handle_errors(Sass_Context* c_ctx) {
00221     try {
00222      throw;
00223     }
00224     catch (Sass_Error& e) {
00225       stringstream msg_stream;
00226       string cwd(Sass::File::get_cwd());
00227       JsonNode* json_err = json_mkobject();
00228       json_append_member(json_err, "status", json_mknumber(1));
00229       json_append_member(json_err, "file", json_mkstring(e.pstate.path.c_str()));
00230       json_append_member(json_err, "line", json_mknumber(e.pstate.line+1));
00231       json_append_member(json_err, "column", json_mknumber(e.pstate.column+1));
00232       json_append_member(json_err, "message", json_mkstring(e.message.c_str()));
00233       string rel_path(Sass::File::resolve_relative_path(e.pstate.path, cwd, cwd));
00234 
00235       string msg_prefix("Error: ");
00236       bool got_newline = false;
00237       msg_stream << msg_prefix;
00238       for (char chr : e.message) {
00239         if (chr == '\n') {
00240           got_newline = true;
00241         } else if (got_newline) {
00242           msg_stream << string(msg_prefix.size(), ' ');
00243           got_newline = false;
00244         }
00245         msg_stream << chr;
00246       }
00247       if (!got_newline) msg_stream << "\n";
00248       msg_stream << string(msg_prefix.size(), ' ');
00249       msg_stream << " on line " << e.pstate.line+1 << " of " << rel_path << "\n";
00250 
00251       // now create the code trace (ToDo: maybe have util functions?)
00252       if (e.pstate.line != string::npos && e.pstate.column != string::npos) {
00253         size_t line = e.pstate.line;
00254         const char* line_beg = e.pstate.src;
00255         while (line_beg && *line_beg && line) {
00256           if (*line_beg == '\n') -- line;
00257           ++ line_beg;
00258         }
00259         const char* line_end = line_beg;
00260         while (line_end && *line_end && *line_end != '\n') {
00261           if (*line_end == '\n') break;
00262           if (*line_end == '\r') break;
00263           line_end ++;
00264         }
00265         size_t max_left = 42; size_t max_right = 78;
00266         size_t move_in = e.pstate.column > max_left ? e.pstate.column - max_left : 0;
00267         size_t shorten = (line_end - line_beg) - move_in > max_right ?
00268                          (line_end - line_beg) - move_in - max_right : 0;
00269         msg_stream << ">> " << string(line_beg + move_in, line_end - shorten) << "\n";
00270         msg_stream << "   " << string(e.pstate.column - move_in, '-') << "^\n";
00271       }
00272 
00273       c_ctx->error_json = json_stringify(json_err, "  ");;
00274       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00275       c_ctx->error_text = strdup(e.message.c_str());
00276       c_ctx->error_status = 1;
00277       c_ctx->error_file = sass_strdup(e.pstate.path.c_str());
00278       c_ctx->error_line = e.pstate.line+1;
00279       c_ctx->error_column = e.pstate.column+1;
00280       c_ctx->error_src = e.pstate.src;
00281       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00282       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00283       json_delete(json_err);
00284     }
00285     catch(bad_alloc& ba) {
00286       stringstream msg_stream;
00287       JsonNode* json_err = json_mkobject();
00288       msg_stream << "Unable to allocate memory: " << ba.what() << endl;
00289       json_append_member(json_err, "status", json_mknumber(2));
00290       json_append_member(json_err, "message", json_mkstring(ba.what()));
00291       c_ctx->error_json = json_stringify(json_err, "  ");;
00292       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00293       c_ctx->error_text = strdup(ba.what());
00294       c_ctx->error_status = 2;
00295       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00296       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00297       json_delete(json_err);
00298     }
00299     catch (std::exception& e) {
00300       stringstream msg_stream;
00301       JsonNode* json_err = json_mkobject();
00302       msg_stream << "Error: " << e.what() << endl;
00303       json_append_member(json_err, "status", json_mknumber(3));
00304       json_append_member(json_err, "message", json_mkstring(e.what()));
00305       c_ctx->error_json = json_stringify(json_err, "  ");;
00306       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00307       c_ctx->error_text = strdup(e.what());
00308       c_ctx->error_status = 3;
00309       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00310       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00311       json_delete(json_err);
00312     }
00313     catch (string& e) {
00314       stringstream msg_stream;
00315       JsonNode* json_err = json_mkobject();
00316       msg_stream << "Error: " << e << endl;
00317       json_append_member(json_err, "status", json_mknumber(4));
00318       json_append_member(json_err, "message", json_mkstring(e.c_str()));
00319       c_ctx->error_json = json_stringify(json_err, "  ");;
00320       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00321       c_ctx->error_text = strdup(e.c_str());
00322       c_ctx->error_status = 4;
00323       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00324       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00325       json_delete(json_err);
00326     }
00327     catch (...) {
00328       stringstream msg_stream;
00329       JsonNode* json_err = json_mkobject();
00330       msg_stream << "Unknown error occurred" << endl;
00331       json_append_member(json_err, "status", json_mknumber(5));
00332       json_append_member(json_err, "message", json_mkstring("unknown"));
00333       c_ctx->error_json = json_stringify(json_err, "  ");;
00334       c_ctx->error_message = sass_strdup(msg_stream.str().c_str());
00335       c_ctx->error_text = strdup("unknown");
00336       c_ctx->error_status = 5;
00337       c_ctx->output_string = 0;
00338       c_ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00339       json_delete(json_err);
00340     }
00341     return c_ctx->error_status;
00342   }

00344   // generic compilation function (not exported, use file/data compile instead)
00345   static Sass_Compiler* sass_prepare_context (Sass_Context* c_ctx, Context::Data cpp_opt) throw()
00346   {
00347     try {
00348 
00349       // get input/output path from options
00350       string input_path = safe_str(c_ctx->input_path);
00351       string output_path = safe_str(c_ctx->output_path);
00352       // maybe we can extract an output path from input path
00353       if (output_path == "" && input_path != "") {
00354         int lastindex = static_cast<int>(input_path.find_last_of("."));
00355         output_path = (lastindex > -1 ? input_path.substr(0, lastindex) : input_path) + ".css";
00356       }
00357 
00358       // convert include path linked list to static array
00359       struct string_list* inc = c_ctx->include_paths;
00360       // very poor loop to get the length of the linked list
00361       size_t inc_size = 0; while (inc) { inc_size ++; inc = inc->next; }
00362       // create char* array to hold all paths plus null terminator
00363       const char** include_paths = (const char**) calloc(inc_size + 1, sizeof(char*));
00364       if (include_paths == 0) throw(bad_alloc());
00365       // reset iterator
00366       inc = c_ctx->include_paths;
00367       // copy over the paths
00368       for (size_t i = 0; inc; i++) {
00369         include_paths[i] = inc->string;
00370         inc = inc->next;
00371       }
00372 
00373       // convert plugin path linked list to static array
00374       struct string_list* imp = c_ctx->plugin_paths;
00375       // very poor loop to get the length of the linked list
00376       size_t imp_size = 0; while (imp) { imp_size ++; imp = imp->next; }
00377       // create char* array to hold all paths plus null terminator
00378       const char** plugin_paths = (const char**) calloc(imp_size + 1, sizeof(char*));
00379       if (plugin_paths == 0) throw(bad_alloc());
00380       // reset iterator
00381       imp = c_ctx->plugin_paths;
00382       // copy over the paths
00383       for (size_t i = 0; imp; i++) {
00384         plugin_paths[i] = imp->string;
00385         imp = imp->next;
00386       }
00387 
00388       // transfer the options to c++
00389       cpp_opt.c_compiler(0)
00390              .c_options(c_ctx)
00391              .input_path(input_path)
00392              .output_path(output_path)
00393              .output_style((Output_Style) c_ctx->output_style)
00394              .is_indented_syntax_src(c_ctx->is_indented_syntax_src)
00395              .source_comments(c_ctx->source_comments)
00396              .source_map_file(safe_str(c_ctx->source_map_file))
00397              .source_map_root(safe_str(c_ctx->source_map_root))
00398              .source_map_embed(c_ctx->source_map_embed)
00399              .source_map_contents(c_ctx->source_map_contents)
00400              .omit_source_map_url(c_ctx->omit_source_map_url)
00401              .include_paths_c_str(c_ctx->include_path)
00402              .plugin_paths_c_str(c_ctx->plugin_path)
00403              // .include_paths_array(include_paths)
00404              // .plugin_paths_array(plugin_paths)
00405              .include_paths(vector<string>())
00406              .plugin_paths(vector<string>())
00407              .precision(c_ctx->precision)
00408              .linefeed(c_ctx->linefeed)
00409              .indent(c_ctx->indent);
00410 
00411       // create new c++ Context
00412       Context* cpp_ctx = new Context(cpp_opt);
00413       // free intermediate data
00414       free(include_paths);
00415       free(plugin_paths);
00416 
00417       // register our custom functions
00418       if (c_ctx->c_functions) {
00419         auto this_func_data = c_ctx->c_functions;
00420         while (this_func_data && *this_func_data) {
00421           cpp_ctx->add_c_function(*this_func_data);
00422           ++this_func_data;
00423         }
00424       }
00425 
00426       // register our custom headers
00427       if (c_ctx->c_headers) {
00428         auto this_head_data = c_ctx->c_headers;
00429         while (this_head_data && *this_head_data) {
00430           cpp_ctx->add_c_header(*this_head_data);
00431           ++this_head_data;
00432         }
00433       }
00434 
00435       // register our custom importers
00436       if (c_ctx->c_importers) {
00437         auto this_imp_data = c_ctx->c_importers;
00438         while (this_imp_data && *this_imp_data) {
00439           cpp_ctx->add_c_importer(*this_imp_data);
00440           ++this_imp_data;
00441         }
00442       }
00443 
00444       // reset error status
00445       c_ctx->error_json = 0;
00446       c_ctx->error_text = 0;
00447       c_ctx->error_message = 0;
00448       c_ctx->error_status = 0;
00449       // reset error position
00450       c_ctx->error_src = 0;
00451       c_ctx->error_file = 0;
00452       c_ctx->error_line = string::npos;
00453       c_ctx->error_column = string::npos;
00454 
00455       // allocate a new compiler instance
00456       Sass_Compiler* compiler = (struct Sass_Compiler*) calloc(1, sizeof(struct Sass_Compiler));
00457       compiler->state = SASS_COMPILER_CREATED;
00458 
00459       // store in sass compiler
00460       compiler->c_ctx = c_ctx;
00461       compiler->cpp_ctx = cpp_ctx;
00462       cpp_ctx->c_compiler = compiler;
00463 
00464       // use to parse block
00465       return compiler;
00466 
00467     }
00468     // pass errors to generic error handler
00469     catch (...) { handle_errors(c_ctx); }
00470 
00471     // error
00472     return 0;
00473 
00474   }
00475 
00476   static Block* sass_parse_block (Sass_Compiler* compiler) throw()
00477   {
00478 
00479     // assert valid pointer
00480     if (compiler == 0) return 0;
00481     // The cpp context must be set by now
00482     Context* cpp_ctx = compiler->cpp_ctx;
00483     Sass_Context* c_ctx = compiler->c_ctx;
00484     // We will take care to wire up the rest
00485     compiler->cpp_ctx->c_compiler = compiler;
00486     compiler->state = SASS_COMPILER_PARSED;
00487 
00488     try {
00489 
00490       // get input/output path from options
00491       string input_path = safe_str(c_ctx->input_path);
00492       string output_path = safe_str(c_ctx->output_path);
00493 
00494       // parsed root block
00495       Block* root = 0;
00496 
00497       // maybe skip some entries of included files
00498       // we do not include stdin for data contexts
00499       size_t skip = 0;
00500 
00501       // dispatch to the correct render function
00502       if (c_ctx->type == SASS_CONTEXT_FILE) {
00503         root = cpp_ctx->parse_file();
00504       } else if (c_ctx->type == SASS_CONTEXT_DATA) {
00505         root = cpp_ctx->parse_string();
00506         skip = 1; // skip first entry of includes
00507       }
00508 
00509       // skip all prefixed files?
00510       skip += cpp_ctx->head_imports;
00511 
00512       // copy the included files on to the context (dont forget to free)
00513       if (root) copy_strings(cpp_ctx->get_included_files(skip), &c_ctx->included_files);
00514 
00515       // return parsed block
00516       return root;
00517 
00518     }
00519     // pass errors to generic error handler
00520     catch (...) { handle_errors(c_ctx); }
00521 
00522     // error
00523     return 0;
00524 
00525   }
00526 
00527   // generic compilation function (not exported, use file/data compile instead)
00528   static int sass_compile_context (Sass_Context* c_ctx, Context::Data cpp_opt)
00529   {
00530 
00531     // prepare sass compiler with context and options
00532     Sass_Compiler* compiler = sass_prepare_context(c_ctx, cpp_opt);
00533 
00534     try {
00535       // call each compiler step
00536       sass_compiler_parse(compiler);
00537       sass_compiler_execute(compiler);
00538     }
00539     // pass errors to generic error handler
00540     catch (...) { handle_errors(c_ctx); }
00541 
00542     sass_delete_compiler(compiler);
00543 
00544     return c_ctx->error_status;
00545   }
00546 
00547   inline void init_options (struct Sass_Options* options)
00548   {
00549     options->precision = 5;
00550     options->indent = "  ";
00551     options->linefeed = LFEED;
00552   }
00553 
00554   Sass_Options* ADDCALL sass_make_options (void)
00555   {
00556     struct Sass_Options* options = (struct Sass_Options*) calloc(1, sizeof(struct Sass_Options));
00557     if (options == 0) { cerr << "Error allocating memory for options" << endl; return 0; }
00558     init_options(options);
00559     return options;
00560   }
00561 
00562   Sass_File_Context* ADDCALL sass_make_file_context(const char* input_path)
00563   {
00564     struct Sass_File_Context* ctx = (struct Sass_File_Context*) calloc(1, sizeof(struct Sass_File_Context));
00565     if (ctx == 0) { cerr << "Error allocating memory for file context" << endl; return 0; }
00566     ctx->type = SASS_CONTEXT_FILE;
00567     init_options(ctx);
00568     try {
00569       if (input_path == 0) { throw(runtime_error("File context created without an input path")); }
00570       if (*input_path == 0) { throw(runtime_error("File context created with empty input path")); }
00571       sass_option_set_input_path(ctx, input_path);
00572     } catch (...) {
00573       handle_errors(ctx);
00574     }
00575     return ctx;
00576   }
00577 
00578   Sass_Data_Context* ADDCALL sass_make_data_context(char* source_string)
00579   {
00580     struct Sass_Data_Context* ctx = (struct Sass_Data_Context*) calloc(1, sizeof(struct Sass_Data_Context));
00581     if (ctx == 0) { cerr << "Error allocating memory for data context" << endl; return 0; }
00582     ctx->type = SASS_CONTEXT_DATA;
00583     init_options(ctx);
00584     try {
00585       if (source_string == 0) { throw(runtime_error("Data context created without a source string")); }
00586       if (*source_string == 0) { throw(runtime_error("Data context created with empty source string")); }
00587       ctx->source_string = source_string;
00588     } catch (...) {
00589       handle_errors(ctx);
00590     }
00591     return ctx;
00592   }
00593 
00594   struct Sass_Compiler* ADDCALL sass_make_file_compiler (struct Sass_File_Context* c_ctx)
00595   {
00596     if (c_ctx == 0) return 0;
00597     Context::Data cpp_opt = Context::Data();
00598     cpp_opt.entry_point(c_ctx->input_path);
00599     return sass_prepare_context(c_ctx, cpp_opt);
00600   }
00601 
00602   struct Sass_Compiler* ADDCALL sass_make_data_compiler (struct Sass_Data_Context* c_ctx)
00603   {
00604     if (c_ctx == 0) return 0;
00605     Context::Data cpp_opt = Context::Data();
00606     cpp_opt.source_c_str(c_ctx->source_string);
00607     return sass_prepare_context(c_ctx, cpp_opt);
00608   }
00609 
00610   int ADDCALL sass_compile_data_context(Sass_Data_Context* data_ctx)
00611   {
00612     if (data_ctx == 0) return 1;
00613     Sass_Context* c_ctx = data_ctx;
00614     if (c_ctx->error_status)
00615       return c_ctx->error_status;
00616     Context::Data cpp_opt = Context::Data();
00617     try {
00618       if (data_ctx->source_string == 0) { throw(runtime_error("Data context has no source string")); }
00619       if (*data_ctx->source_string == 0) { throw(runtime_error("Data context has empty source string")); }
00620       cpp_opt.source_c_str(data_ctx->source_string);
00621     }
00622     catch (...) { return handle_errors(c_ctx) | 1; }
00623     return sass_compile_context(c_ctx, cpp_opt);
00624   }
00625 
00626   int ADDCALL sass_compile_file_context(Sass_File_Context* file_ctx)
00627   {
00628     if (file_ctx == 0) return 1;
00629     Sass_Context* c_ctx = file_ctx;
00630     if (c_ctx->error_status)
00631       return c_ctx->error_status;
00632     Context::Data cpp_opt = Context::Data();
00633     try {
00634       if (file_ctx->input_path == 0) { throw(runtime_error("File context has no input path")); }
00635       if (*file_ctx->input_path == 0) { throw(runtime_error("File context has empty input path")); }
00636       cpp_opt.entry_point(file_ctx->input_path);
00637     }
00638     catch (...) { return handle_errors(c_ctx) | 1; }
00639     return sass_compile_context(c_ctx, cpp_opt);
00640   }
00641 
00642   int ADDCALL sass_compiler_parse(struct Sass_Compiler* compiler)
00643   {
00644     if (compiler == 0) return 1;
00645     if (compiler->state == SASS_COMPILER_PARSED) return 0;
00646     if (compiler->state != SASS_COMPILER_CREATED) return -1;
00647     if (compiler->c_ctx == NULL) return 1;
00648     if (compiler->cpp_ctx == NULL) return 1;
00649     if (compiler->c_ctx->error_status)
00650       return compiler->c_ctx->error_status;
00651     // parse the context we have set up (file or data)
00652     compiler->root = sass_parse_block(compiler);
00653     // success
00654     return 0;
00655   }
00656 
00657   int ADDCALL sass_compiler_execute(struct Sass_Compiler* compiler)
00658   {
00659     if (compiler == 0) return 1;
00660     if (compiler->state == SASS_COMPILER_EXECUTED) return 0;
00661     if (compiler->state != SASS_COMPILER_PARSED) return -1;
00662     if (compiler->c_ctx == NULL) return 1;
00663     if (compiler->cpp_ctx == NULL) return 1;
00664     if (compiler->root == NULL) return 1;
00665     if (compiler->c_ctx->error_status)
00666       return compiler->c_ctx->error_status;
00667     compiler->state = SASS_COMPILER_EXECUTED;
00668     Context* cpp_ctx = (Context*) compiler->cpp_ctx;
00669     Block* root = (Block*) compiler->root;
00670     // compile the parsed root block
00671     try { compiler->c_ctx->output_string = cpp_ctx->compile_block(root); }
00672     // pass catched errors to generic error handler
00673     catch (...) { return handle_errors(compiler->c_ctx) | 1; }
00674     // generate source map json and store on context
00675     compiler->c_ctx->source_map_string = cpp_ctx->generate_source_map();
00676     // success
00677     return 0;
00678   }
00679 
00680   // helper function, not exported, only accessible locally
00681   static void sass_clear_options (struct Sass_Options* options)
00682   {
00683     if (options == 0) return;
00684     // Deallocate custom functions
00685     if (options->c_functions) {
00686       Sass_Function_List this_func_data = options->c_functions;
00687       while (this_func_data && *this_func_data) {
00688         free(*this_func_data);
00689         ++this_func_data;
00690       }
00691     }
00692     // Deallocate custom headers
00693     if (options->c_headers) {
00694       Sass_Importer_List this_head_data = options->c_headers;
00695       while (this_head_data && *this_head_data) {
00696         free(*this_head_data);
00697         ++this_head_data;
00698       }
00699     }
00700     // Deallocate custom importers
00701     if (options->c_importers) {
00702       Sass_Importer_List this_imp_data = options->c_importers;
00703       while (this_imp_data && *this_imp_data) {
00704         free(*this_imp_data);
00705         ++this_imp_data;
00706       }
00707     }
00708     // Deallocate inc paths
00709     if (options->plugin_paths) {
00710       struct string_list* cur;
00711       struct string_list* next;
00712       cur = options->plugin_paths;
00713       while (cur) {
00714         next = cur->next;
00715         free(cur->string);
00716         free(cur);
00717         cur = next;
00718       }
00719     }
00720     // Deallocate inc paths
00721     if (options->include_paths) {
00722       struct string_list* cur;
00723       struct string_list* next;
00724       cur = options->include_paths;
00725       while (cur) {
00726         next = cur->next;
00727         free(cur->string);
00728         free(cur);
00729         cur = next;
00730       }
00731     }
00732     // Free custom functions
00733     free(options->c_functions);
00734     // Free custom importers
00735     free(options->c_importers);
00736     free(options->c_headers);
00737     // Reset our pointers
00738     options->c_functions = 0;
00739     options->c_importers = 0;
00740     options->c_headers = 0;
00741     options->plugin_paths = 0;
00742     options->include_paths = 0;
00743   }
00744 
00745   // helper function, not exported, only accessible locally
00746   // sass_free_context is also defined in old sass_interface
00747   static void sass_clear_context (struct Sass_Context* ctx)
00748   {
00749     if (ctx == 0) return;
00750     // release the allocated memory (mostly via sass_strdup)
00751     if (ctx->output_string)     free(ctx->output_string);
00752     if (ctx->source_map_string) free(ctx->source_map_string);
00753     if (ctx->error_message)     free(ctx->error_message);
00754     if (ctx->error_text)        free(ctx->error_text);
00755     if (ctx->error_json)        free(ctx->error_json);
00756     if (ctx->error_file)        free(ctx->error_file);
00757     if (ctx->input_path)        free(ctx->input_path);
00758     if (ctx->output_path)       free(ctx->output_path);
00759     if (ctx->include_path)      free(ctx->include_path);
00760     if (ctx->source_map_file)   free(ctx->source_map_file);
00761     if (ctx->source_map_root)   free(ctx->source_map_root);
00762     free_string_array(ctx->included_files);
00763     // play safe and reset properties
00764     ctx->output_string = 0;
00765     ctx->source_map_string = 0;
00766     ctx->error_message = 0;
00767     ctx->error_text = 0;
00768     ctx->error_json = 0;
00769     ctx->error_file = 0;
00770     ctx->input_path = 0;
00771     ctx->output_path = 0;
00772     ctx->include_path = 0;
00773     ctx->source_map_file = 0;
00774     ctx->source_map_root = 0;
00775     ctx->included_files = 0;
00776     // now clear the options
00777     sass_clear_options(ctx);
00778   }
00779 
00780   void ADDCALL sass_delete_compiler (struct Sass_Compiler* compiler)
00781   {
00782     if (compiler == 0) return;
00783     Context* cpp_ctx = (Context*) compiler->cpp_ctx;
00784     compiler->cpp_ctx = 0;
00785     delete cpp_ctx;
00786     free(compiler);
00787   }
00788 
00789   // Deallocate all associated memory with contexts
00790   void ADDCALL sass_delete_file_context (struct Sass_File_Context* ctx) { sass_clear_context(ctx); free(ctx); }
00791   void ADDCALL sass_delete_data_context (struct Sass_Data_Context* ctx) { sass_clear_context(ctx); free(ctx); }

00812   // Calculate the size of the stored null terminated array
00813   size_t ADDCALL sass_context_get_included_files_size (struct Sass_Context* ctx)
00814   { size_t l = 0; auto i = ctx->included_files; while (i && *i) { ++i; ++l; } return l; }

00858   // Push function for include paths (no manipulation support for now)
00859   void ADDCALL sass_option_push_include_path(struct Sass_Options* options, const char* path)
00860   {
00861 
00862     struct string_list* include_path = (struct string_list*) calloc(1, sizeof(struct string_list));
00863     if (include_path == 0) return;
00864     include_path->string = path ? sass_strdup(path) : 0;
00865     struct string_list* last = options->include_paths;
00866     if (!options->include_paths) {
00867       options->include_paths = include_path;
00868     } else {
00869       while (last->next)
00870         last = last->next;
00871       last->next = include_path;
00872     }
00873 
00874   }
00875 
00876   // Push function for plugin paths (no manipulation support for now)
00877   void ADDCALL sass_option_push_plugin_path(struct Sass_Options* options, const char* path)
00878   {
00879 
00880     struct string_list* plugin_path = (struct string_list*) calloc(1, sizeof(struct string_list));
00881     if (plugin_path == 0) return;
00882     plugin_path->string = path ? sass_strdup(path) : 0;
00883     struct string_list* last = options->plugin_paths;
00884     if (!options->plugin_paths) {
00885       options->plugin_paths = plugin_path;
00886     } else {
00887       while (last->next)
00888         last = last->next;
00889       last->next = plugin_path;
00890     }
00891 
00892   }
